string-array.name: eagle
string-array.item: Name comes from Eagle Bridge bronze eagle statues on the bridge. This is symbolic protectors and defenders. Eagle Bridge was built in 1891 by Adolf Vaclav Kolar and Vaclav Proshek. Eagle bridge was built as a symbol of freedom.
Sofia, Tsarigradsko Shose boulevard and Evlogi Georgiev street crosses the Eagle bridge \nLocation: 42.690622, 23.33745 (Click to see on the map)
